item.title: Hail Mary Podcast
item.description: I was a guest on Pagerduty’s Page it to the Limit podcast in the July 2024 podcast book club episode about Andy Weir’s novel, Project Hail Mary.. You can find the episode here.

item.title: Use Pagerduty With Home Assistant
item.description: I wanted my Home Assistant to be able to send me alerts when Bad Things are detected like water on my basement floor. I’m an SRE, and have been using PagerDuty for years, so I decided to set up a personal PagerDuty account and connect it to my Home Assistant.
